name: 8-Bit Adventures 1: Bundle
description: 8-Bit Adventures 1: Bundle includes: 8-Bit Adventures 1: The Forgotten Journey Remastered Edition - 8-Bit Adventures: The Forgotten Journey Remastered Edition is a retro-styled JRPG with polish and personality, that focuses less on references (although there are plenty!) and more on telling a story... 8-Bit Adventures 1: Soundtrack & Composer's Selection - The official soundtrack release of 8-Bit Adventures: The Forgotten Journey Remastered Edition contains 29 songs and four exclusive orchestral pieces, beautifully remastered by Carfonu - the original composer.
